an image takes you to the asset folder. You can also choose to upload an image at this point (bottom left) and either drag and drop an image or navigate to an image directly to the page makes it available only to the page it is uploaded to, and possibly a need for digital asset management away from Crownpeak DXM to track these types of assets. Image sizes are based on the frontend code implemented.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
